name: Oh My Green
tag_list: marketplace, organic, green, sustainable, non-gmo, foods, stanford
overview:
Oh My Green! or (OhMyGreen! or OMG!) is your non-GMO & organic online grocery store. Our mission is to help you lead a healthy and blissful life.

Integrity is our goal and most important principle. Integrity means to be whole, and behave in accordance with our values and ethical beliefs. We believe in restoring integrity to what we consume. We aim to enjoy products in harmony with values that promote health, sustainability, and bliss.

The four founders (Michael, Jonathan, Lorenzo, and Xisco) met while attending a meditation course. The twice a day meditation opened our eyes not only to the possibility of transforming our lives, but also the lives of others. We aim to do this by restoring integrity to the goods we buy and consume. We realized misleading marketing has often replaced truth. To counter this we developed our motto: “Share Goods With Integrity.” This will promote good health for individuals and also help maintain a clean and sustainable planet.

OUR ORGANIC FOOD DISCOVERY Michael’s grandmother has an organic garden in Germany. He enjoyed many home cooked meals from her. When he first moved to the U.S. and tasted regular supermarket fruits and vegetables they tasted like plastic. He eventually discovered Whole Foods and its organic foods. Jonathan discovered green products through Michael and never looked back…

Xisco and Lorenzo grew up on a Mediterranean Island when all food still came from local, sustainable, organic farms. Their parents even owned a local, organic grocery store! When the big supermarket chains arrived and the local stores and farms started disappearing, they quickly discovered the big negative difference in taste and health.

INTEGRITY Integrity is our goal and most important principle. Integrity means to be whole, and behave in accordance with our values and ethical beliefs. We believe in restoring integrity to what we consume. We aim to enjoy products in harmony with values that promote health, sustainability, and bliss.

OUR VENDOR STANDARDS Our curators have high vendor standards so that we can make discovery fun for you and save you time. At the same time, we are just a humble group of dedicated greenerds and always appreciate feedback from our community.
